# isPresented

**Instance Property**

Specifies whether the user notification has been presented.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPresented: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

In some cases, for example when your application is frontmost, the notification center may decide not to actually present a delivered notification. In that case, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. It is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the notification was presented according to user preferences.

## Delivery Information

- **isRemote**: Specifies whether the remote was generated by a push notification.
- **soundName**: Specifies the name of the sound to play when the notification is delivered.
